announce.message: A hot, hellish wind has started to blow through the ruins of Ashzarah.
Orshabaal's minions are working on his return to the World. LEAVE Ashzarah at once, mortals.
Orshabaal is about to make his way into the mortal realm. Run for your lives!
Orshabaal has been summoned from hell to plague the lands of mortals again.
